meanings.definition: The quality or state of being handsome.
meanings.sent1: His handsomenesses always caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: She admired the handsomenesses of the old building.
meanings.sent3: The handsomenesses of the puppy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The handsomenesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The handsomenesses of the flower garden were truly breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The attractiveness or pleasing appearance of someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The handsomenesses of the actor made him a favorite among fans.
meanings.sent2: The handsomenesses of the dress caught her eye in the store.
meanings.sent3: The handsomenesses of the cake tempted her to take a bite.
meanings.sent4: The handsomenesses of the mountain range took her breath away.
meanings.sent5: The handsomenesses of the painting left a lasting impression on her.
